channel.title: Separable on 思｜制 - Thinking, lecturing and making

item.title: W9-S1 Slop Fields, Separable and First-Order Linear Differential Equations
item.description: 周次: 9 日期: April 20, 2022 节次: 1 In this lecture, we introduce some basic concept for differential equations, how to think of them, how to describe them and how to solve them. The most important thing is to know how to solve a differential equation. We will solve typical separable differential equations as well as the first-order linear differential equations. Chapter 9. Further
